description: Sepsis - systemic infection with fever, elevated WBC, positive blood cultures, SIRS criteria
Acute MI - ACUTE troponin elevation, ST changes, chest pain, NEW cardiac ischemia, acute event
Chronic CAD - STABLE coronary disease, history of stenosis, NO acute troponin rise, chronic
Aortic stenosis - PRIMARY valve disease, calcification, systolic murmur, reduced valve area
Heart failure - PRIMARY pump failure, reduced EF, pulmonary edema, elevated BNP, fluid overload
Respiratory failure - hypoxemia requiring oxygen, increased work of breathing, abnormal blood gases
Kidney failure - rising creatinine, decreased urine output, elevated BUN, metabolic acidosis
